website_summaries.verdict: Enduring design in a versatile boot.
pros: Comfortable boots with a 3-inch heel that makes them perfect for day-to-night wear
Well-made in soft leather or suede that goes with just about any outfit
cons: The strappy buckle accents jingle when you walk

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, love them but as all Vince Camuto shoe line run small, They are extremely tight around the ball of your foot area and I have a narrow foot... Thought the block heel would help with stability, NOT! A little too high for me. Maybe it will work for a person who wears heels just not for me. I wish I could wear them comfortably :(
customer_reviews.author: Mybls~ brkaquay~

customer_reviews.title: No brainer.
customer_reviews.text: Immediately knew these were the boots for me! I love the quality and comfort of these boots. The height is perfect and well built heel that helps with stability. Also, I would like to say I'm glad I read previous reviews about sizing. I am an 8 but went up half a size and am happy I did because they don't feel too big and I can wear warm socks and still feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice but after running around at work for 6 hrs the balls of my feet started to hurt. The heels are a bit too high if you are on your feet for more than 4 hours. I really wanted them to be more comfortable for everyday work wear but the health and look of my feet are more important.
customer_reviews.author: tonet0908

customer_reviews.title: The boots are beautiful and they look amazing
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful and they look amazing. They do fit somewhat small but I can still fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: Anamc

customer_reviews.title: the brand is so good
customer_reviews.text: Too small for me. I should ask for 11w and not 11m
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather booties
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, but I will say they are a bit snug in the toe box. I have a very average foot, not narrow but also not wide. I have worn them about 4 times. They have softened a bit, but still a little tight. After a few hours they start to hurt. Hopefully they will continue to stretch out and soften up with wear. They look great with skinny jeans and leggings. The color is beautiful and the leather is high quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: I really like them, had to exchange for a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, had to exchange for a half size up and my daughter had to go a full size up so they seem to run small. They look great, and are well made boots I will have forever.
customer_reviews.author: Bananii

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They're just what I expected. Leather quality is great - very soft. Fit perfectly over my pants and I wear them daily to the office and out.
customer_reviews.author: JessL

customer_reviews.title: Can't say they are my favorite boot, but it is a different look and ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't say they are my favorite boot, but it is a different look and the shoes are very well made + comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MVZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the style or color
customer_reviews.text: Not up to Vince Camuto standards. Didn't like the style or color. It looked dirty. Actually looks cuter in the photo. It is on its way back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pug Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good Old Vince
customer_reviews.text: Love my Vince Camuto Collection. You can't you cant do wrong with Vince Camuto. I have many pair of shoes and a few bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amonty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots. They fit well because I read the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. They fit well because I read the reviews before ordering and opted to order a half a size larger. Glad I did:)
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: I loved the comfort and the fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the whiskey brown boots first. I loved the comfort and the fit. So that led to the purchase of the black pair. Got them at a great price, also.
customer_reviews.author: drsus

customer_reviews.title: Obvs any kind of heel wont be comfortable all day long
customer_reviews.text: Once you break these in - they are so cute! Obvs any kind of heel wont be comfortable all day long. But these are a happy medium.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very chic boot. Makes your feet look smaller, very comfortable to wear. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love every pair of vince camuto boots that I've bought and these are no exception. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: are comfortable, and look great
customer_reviews.text: These boots are of quality construction and materials, are comfortable, and look great. What a find!
customer_reviews.author: BusyWorkingMom2x

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots; need to buy 1/2 size larger as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots; need to buy 1/2 size larger as they run smaller. I'm usually good wearing these style boots for 4 to 5 hours of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Quick

customer_reviews.title: The perfect boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! The quality of the boot and the color is awesome!! The large heel is comfortable and very sturdy! My only small issue with these boots, is that the buckles "jingle" when I walk...and I started to notice this as I work in a quiet office at work. I would recommend these to anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Cute and much more comfortable than I thought they would be. I wore them all day at work the first time out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love this boots the only problem is that they run a little small
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I just wore this shoes and I'm super happy with the looks and fitting. I received several complements.
customer_reviews.author: vilma sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got a pair in black and one in brown.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Abell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Boot
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 and ordered this size. It did not fit so I returned for a size 8. The boot still did not fit like it should for a half size larger. I kept the boot hoping it will stretch with wear. I have only worn it once so far, so the jury is still out on this. This boot is very cute though and if it stretches a little I will be happy with my purchase. Be aware that it seems to run small and at the very least order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Impacting Strangers

customer_reviews.title: I usually like Vince Camuto shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and felt very uncomfortable. I usually wear 8, but bought 8.5 this time. But it still does not fit. I usually like Vince Camuto shoes, but do not recommend this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: focus and concentrate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE them. They are beautiful and comfortable. I am on my feet all day and they never leave my feet feeling cramped or sore.
customer_reviews.author: bsharona

customer_reviews.title: It is now purchased the product are lucky This adorable design features fit everything good and
customer_reviews.text: It is now purchased the product are lucky This adorable design features fit everything good and satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: LEE DONGGUN

customer_reviews.title: Just did not like after i put on
customer_reviews.text: Just did not like after i put on, the toe area is tight n looks darker than rest of shoe.. Returned
customer_reviews.author: shannon spiker

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: great boots. I like them but it runs small. I usually wear 6 but ordered 6.5. It is still a bit tight but ok. So order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Eunkyung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved them! They fit perfectly and the color is lovely! I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R

product_meta.title: Vince Camuto Women's Simlee Boot
product_meta.description: Vince Camuto is a true footwear innovator, both of design and of industry. The designer and creator of the Camuto group, Vince Camuto produces many brands and styles, and Vince Camuto women's shoes are among the most beautiful and finely crafted footwear available.
feature_bullets: Ankle-high boot featuring dual buckled straps, burnished toe, and stacked block heel
